00060 /* context checked on having screen, window and area */
00061 wmGesture *WM_gesture_new(bContext *C, wmEvent *event, int type)
00062 {
00063     wmGesture *gesture = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmGesture), "new gesture");
00064     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
00065     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00066     int sx, sy;
00067     
00068     BLI_addtail(&window->gesture, gesture);
00069     
00070     gesture->type = type;
00071     gesture->event_type = event->type;
00072     gesture->swinid = ar->swinid;    /* means only in area-region context! */
00073     
00074     wm_subwindow_getorigin(window, gesture->swinid, &sx, &sy);
00075     
00076     if (ELEM5(type, WM_GESTURE_RECT, WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT, WM_GESTURE_TWEAK,
00077               WM_GESTURE_CIRCLE, WM_GESTURE_STRAIGHTLINE))
00078     {
00079         rcti *rect = MEM_callocN(sizeof(rcti), "gesture rect new");
00080         
00081         gesture->customdata = rect;
00082         rect->xmin = event->x - sx;
00083         rect->ymin = event->y - sy;
00084         if (type == WM_GESTURE_CIRCLE) {
00085 #ifdef GESTURE_MEMORY
00086             rect->xmax = circle_select_size;
00087 #else
00088             rect->xmax = 25;    // XXX temp
00089 #endif
00090         }
00091         else {
00092             rect->xmax = event->x - sx;
00093             rect->ymax = event->y - sy;
00094         }
00095     }
00096     else if (ELEM(type, WM_GESTURE_LINES, WM_GESTURE_LASSO)) {
00097         short *lasso;
00098         gesture->customdata = lasso = MEM_callocN(2 * sizeof(short) * WM_LASSO_MIN_POINTS, "lasso points");
00099         lasso[0] = event->x - sx;
00100         lasso[1] = event->y - sy;
00101         gesture->points = 1;
00102         gesture->size = WM_LASSO_MIN_POINTS;
00103     }
00104     
00105     return gesture;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void WM_gesture_end(bContext *C, wmGesture *gesture)
00109 {
00110     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00111     
00112     if (win->tweak == gesture)
00113         win->tweak = NULL;
00114     BLI_remlink(&win->gesture, gesture);
00115     MEM_freeN(gesture->customdata);
00116     MEM_freeN(gesture);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void WM_gestures_remove(bContext *C)
00120 {
00121     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00122     
00123     while (win->gesture.first)
00124         WM_gesture_end(C, win->gesture.first);
00125 }

00128 /* tweak and line gestures */
00129 int wm_gesture_evaluate(wmGesture *gesture)
00130 {
00131     if (gesture->type == WM_GESTURE_TWEAK) {
00132         rcti *rect = gesture->customdata;
00133         int dx = rect->xmax - rect->xmin;
00134         int dy = rect->ymax - rect->ymin;
00135         if (ABS(dx) + ABS(dy) > U.tweak_threshold) {
00136             int theta = (int)floor(4.0f * atan2f((float)dy, (float)dx) / (float)M_PI + 0.5f);
00137             int val = EVT_GESTURE_W;
00138 
00139             if (theta == 0) val = EVT_GESTURE_E;
00140             else if (theta == 1) val = EVT_GESTURE_NE;
00141             else if (theta == 2) val = EVT_GESTURE_N;
00142             else if (theta == 3) val = EVT_GESTURE_NW;
00143             else if (theta == -1) val = EVT_GESTURE_SE;
00144             else if (theta == -2) val = EVT_GESTURE_S;
00145             else if (theta == -3) val = EVT_GESTURE_SW;
00146             
00147 #if 0
00148             /* debug */
00149             if (val == 1) printf("tweak north\n");
00150             if (val == 2) printf("tweak north-east\n");
00151             if (val == 3) printf("tweak east\n");
00152             if (val == 4) printf("tweak south-east\n");
00153             if (val == 5) printf("tweak south\n");
00154             if (val == 6) printf("tweak south-west\n");
00155             if (val == 7) printf("tweak west\n");
00156             if (val == 8) printf("tweak north-west\n");
00157 #endif          
00158             return val;
00159         }
00160     }
00161     return 0;
00162 }

00167 static void wm_gesture_draw_rect(wmGesture *gt)
00168 {
00169     rcti *rect = (rcti *)gt->customdata;
00170     
00171     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00172     glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.05);
00173     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00174     glVertex2s(rect->xmax, rect->ymin);
00175     glVertex2s(rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
00176     glVertex2s(rect->xmin, rect->ymax);
00177     glVertex2s(rect->xmin, rect->ymin);
00178     glEnd();
00179     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00180     
00181     glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00182     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00183     glLineStipple(1, 0xCCCC);
00184     sdrawbox(rect->xmin, rect->ymin, rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
00185     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00186     glLineStipple(1, 0x3333);
00187     sdrawbox(rect->xmin, rect->ymin, rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
00188     glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00189 }
00190 
00191 static void wm_gesture_draw_line(wmGesture *gt)
00192 {
00193     rcti *rect = (rcti *)gt->customdata;
00194     
00195     glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00196     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00197     glLineStipple(1, 0xAAAA);
00198     sdrawline(rect->xmin, rect->ymin, rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
00199     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00200     glLineStipple(1, 0x5555);
00201     sdrawline(rect->xmin, rect->ymin, rect->xmax, rect->ymax);
00202 
00203     glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00204     
00205 }
00206 
00207 static void wm_gesture_draw_circle(wmGesture *gt)
00208 {
00209     rcti *rect = (rcti *)gt->customdata;
00210 
00211     glTranslatef((float)rect->xmin, (float)rect->ymin, 0.0f);
00212 
00213     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00214     glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.05);
00215     glutil_draw_filled_arc(0.0, M_PI * 2.0, rect->xmax, 40);
00216     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00217     
00218     glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00219     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00220     glLineStipple(1, 0xAAAA);
00221     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0, M_PI * 2.0, rect->xmax, 40);
00222     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00223     glLineStipple(1, 0x5555);
00224     glutil_draw_lined_arc(0.0, M_PI * 2.0, rect->xmax, 40);
00225     
00226     glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00227     glTranslatef((float)-rect->xmin, (float)-rect->ymin, 0.0f);
00228     
00229 }
00230 
00231 static void draw_filled_lasso(wmGesture *gt)
00232 {
00233     ScanFillContext sf_ctx;
00234     ScanFillVert *v = NULL, *lastv = NULL, *firstv = NULL;
00235     ScanFillFace *efa;
00236     short *lasso = (short *)gt->customdata;
00237     int i;
00238     
00239     BLI_begin_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00240     for (i = 0; i < gt->points; i++, lasso += 2) {
00241         float co[3];
00242 
00243         co[0] = (float)lasso[0];
00244         co[1] = (float)lasso[1];
00245         co[2] = 0.0f;
00246 
00247         v = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, co);
00248         if (lastv)
00249             /* e = */ /* UNUSED */ BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, lastv, v);
00250         lastv = v;
00251         if (firstv == NULL) firstv = v;
00252     }
00253     
00254     /* highly unlikely this will fail, but could crash if (gt->points == 0) */
00255     if (firstv) {
00256         float zvec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f};
00257         BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, firstv, v);
00258         BLI_edgefill_ex(&sf_ctx, FALSE, zvec);
00259     
00260         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00261         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.05);
00262         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00263         for (efa = sf_ctx.fillfacebase.first; efa; efa = efa->next) {
00264             glVertex2fv(efa->v1->co);
00265             glVertex2fv(efa->v2->co);
00266             glVertex2fv(efa->v3->co);
00267         }
00268         glEnd();
00269         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00270     
00271         BLI_end_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00272     }
00273 }
00274 
00275 static void wm_gesture_draw_lasso(wmGesture *gt)
00276 {
00277     short *lasso = (short *)gt->customdata;
00278     int i;
00279 
00280     draw_filled_lasso(gt);
00281     
00282     glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00283     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00284     glLineStipple(1, 0xAAAA);
00285     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00286     for (i = 0; i < gt->points; i++, lasso += 2)
00287         glVertex2sv(lasso);
00288     if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_LASSO)
00289         glVertex2sv((short *)gt->customdata);
00290     glEnd();
00291     
00292     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00293     glLineStipple(1, 0x5555);
00294     glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00295     lasso = (short *)gt->customdata;
00296     for (i = 0; i < gt->points; i++, lasso += 2)
00297         glVertex2sv(lasso);
00298     if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_LASSO)
00299         glVertex2sv((short *)gt->customdata);
00300     glEnd();
00301     
00302     glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00303     
00304 }
00305 
00306 static void wm_gesture_draw_cross(wmWindow *win, wmGesture *gt)
00307 {
00308     rcti *rect = (rcti *)gt->customdata;
00309     
00310     glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00311     glColor3ub(96, 96, 96);
00312     glLineStipple(1, 0xCCCC);
00313     sdrawline(rect->xmin - win->sizex, rect->ymin, rect->xmin + win->sizex, rect->ymin);
00314     sdrawline(rect->xmin, rect->ymin - win->sizey, rect->xmin, rect->ymin + win->sizey);
00315     
00316     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00317     glLineStipple(1, 0x3333);
00318     sdrawline(rect->xmin - win->sizex, rect->ymin, rect->xmin + win->sizex, rect->ymin);
00319     sdrawline(rect->xmin, rect->ymin - win->sizey, rect->xmin, rect->ymin + win->sizey);
00320     glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00321 }
00322 
00323 /* called in wm_draw.c */
00324 void wm_gesture_draw(wmWindow *win)
00325 {
00326     wmGesture *gt = (wmGesture *)win->gesture.first;
00327     
00328     for (; gt; gt = gt->next) {
00329         /* all in subwindow space */
00330         wmSubWindowSet(win, gt->swinid);
00331         
00332         if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_RECT)
00333             wm_gesture_draw_rect(gt);
00334 //      else if (gt->type==WM_GESTURE_TWEAK)
00335 //          wm_gesture_draw_line(gt);
00336         else if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_CIRCLE)
00337             wm_gesture_draw_circle(gt);
00338         else if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_CROSS_RECT) {
00339             if (gt->mode == 1)
00340                 wm_gesture_draw_rect(gt);
00341             else
00342                 wm_gesture_draw_cross(win, gt);
00343         }
00344         else if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_LINES)
00345             wm_gesture_draw_lasso(gt);
00346         else if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_LASSO)
00347             wm_gesture_draw_lasso(gt);
00348         else if (gt->type == WM_GESTURE_STRAIGHTLINE)
00349             wm_gesture_draw_line(gt);
00350     }
00351 }
00352 
00353 void wm_gesture_tag_redraw(bContext *C)
00354 {
00355     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00356     bScreen *screen = CTX_wm_screen(C);
00357     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00358     
00359     if (screen)
00360         screen->do_draw_gesture = 1;
00361 
00362     wm_tag_redraw_overlay(win, ar);
00363 }
